title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using Photon version of the Java editor, the popup menu in the left vertical ruler does not appear when right-clicking. This menu is supposed to allow users to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
OB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
This should popup a menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc, but it does not.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a popup menu should appear allowing users to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler
Expected: A popup menu should appear allowing users to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
